channel.title: Text Mining on Angela's personal learning blog
channel.description: Recent content in Text Mining on Angela's personal learning blog

item.title: Christmas Songs Lyrics
item.description: Christmas songs lyrics Today I am going to look at the lyrics of Christmas songs. A certain song that has been around for many many years is not being played on local radios this year as the lyrics are suddenly considered politically incorrect or following the me too movement. As I am also learning text mining at the moment I thought it might be a good idea to have a look at the songs we hear at this time of year.

item.title: Learning Text Mining
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
